Configuration¶

The SDK has to be configured for your connection. The SDK comes with three instances:

  • collins.Config
  • collins.JSONConfig
  • collins.JSONEnvironmentFallbackConfig

A good practice is to use the JSONConfig instance, so your app-id and password are not hard coded in the source code.
